Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Scan the inventory of the specified object, returning a table listing flags, such as transparency (T), single-wear (S) and edibility (E), and values; mass (M), volume (V), description and name of every item.\\r\\n\\r\\nAppend any amount of \\".\\\" to the command to nest into the target's containers, where reference is either row-number or name (e.g. \\"pouch\\")."

"+inv\\r\\n List your inventory\\r\\n\\r\\n+inv \$Kalle:rooms:bar\\r\\n List the inventory of the object \\\r\\n\\r\\n+inv \$kalle\\r\\n List Kalle's inventory\\r\\n\\r\\n+inv \$kalle.pouch\\r\\n List the inventory of the first pouch found in Kalle's inventory.\\r\\n\\r\\n+inv \$kalle.5\\r\\n List the item described on the fifth row of a +inv \$kalle table.\\r\\n\\r\\n+inv \$kalle.5.2.3.5\\r\\n List the fifth row of the item described in the third row of the item described in the second row of the item described in the fifth row of the item des.. you get the point."
